Job Title: Lighting Services Engineer

Location: Birmingham, AL

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Engineering, Information Technology

Description:
Job#: 2020937

Job Description:

Apex Systems is actively hiring for a Lighting Services Engineer role with a Fortune 200 Utilities Client!

This position is designated as hybrid with the requirement that candidates are located in the Montgomery or Prattville, Alabama area.

For immediate consideration, please send your most up-to-date resume in a Word Document to Natalie at [email protected] *

Position: Lighting Services Engineer

Location: Montgomery, AL

Purpose: This contractor will be overseeing lighting services for a major utilities company.

Experience: 0-5+ years of relatable professional experience in Electrical, Civil, Mechanical, or Industrial engineering.

Hours: M-F, 40 hours per week. Possibility of OT with permission. Limited travel would consist of training, meetings or site visits.

Length of Assignment: long-term contract.

Preferred Qualifications:

Engineering Degree Desired - Electrical, Civil, Mechanical, Industrial preferred0-5+ years experienceCo-op Experience or SOCO Distribution/TransmissionSOCO Lighting DesignKnowledge of NEC and/or NESC Specifications a plus

Required Qualifications

Displays team leader attitude Excel at communicating ideas to team members; Be able to teach concepts that you learn.Display a detail-oriented mindset.Desire to know the "why" behind the "how to do something".Seek to understand tasks, not just "complete" tasks.Ability to work independently with little supervisionGood organizational skills and the ability to multi-taskGood communication and networking skillsDisplay attention to detail in work completionA valid drivers licenseMust have a car or truck to useMust be able to endure temperature extremes (Alabama summer and winter temps)Must be able to walk on uneven terrianMust be able to use basic tools - (hammer stakes in the ground)Must have above average computer skills (Microsoft Office, APC priority computer programs)
